thread.title: Sepp Blatter's lawyer says FIFA president 'will not resign' despite calls from major sponsors

title: Sepp Blatter's lawyer says FIFA president 'will not resign' despite calls from major sponsors
text:
Sepp Blatter's lawyer says FIFA president 'will not resign' despite calls from major sponsors Posted: Updated: (AP Photo/Michael Probst). FIFA President Sepp Blatter drives his car into the garage of the FIFA headquarters on his way to work in Zurich, Switzerland, Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015. Blatter was questioned by Swiss investigators on Friday about why FIFA pa... (AP Photo/Michael Probst). FIFA-President Sepp Blatter sits in an office of the FIFA headquarters in Zurich, Switzerland, Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015. Blatter told his staff on Monday he has done "nothing illegal or improper" and has no immediate plans to ... 
ZURICH (AP) - Sepp Blatter's lawyer says FIFA president 'will not resign' despite calls from major sponsors. Copyright 2015 The Associated Press. All rights reserved.
